Use the following settings to create a new Gymnasium course in Studio.


Setting up a New Course


Default Course Settings




Course Name: 
[Full Name] e.g. Coding for Designers


Organization: 
Gymnasium


Course Number: 
[Course ID] e.g. 100


Course Run: 
0






Note


All new courses launch with 
Course Run
 set to 0. This value increments when the course is relaunched.




Course Team


Add admin users to the course team:




josborn@aquent.com


amiller@aquent.com


mbifulco@aquent.com




Add Catalog Content




Course Details


Course Artwork


Instructor Bio


Instructor Photo






Note




Refer to the Gymnasium Assets Site for content


The document with 
My Progress
 in the title for the course outline


edX concepts translated to Gymnasium


Section = Lesson


Subsection = Chapter


Unit = Video or Assessment
